name: All-In-One Pokemon
description:
This is a zip with gba and several pokemon games, with a randomizer and a few roms I like and would recommend.                           Note, you must legally own a copy of used games, or else you will be pirating a 20yo game, top of the FBI most wanted list.

More games might be added in future releases, also may do so with ds and 3ds, depends on how lazy I am.
